function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possible lack of effective preventive measures in the real estate industry","Impact":"Risk of uncontrolled spread of COVID-19 in built environments","Mitigation":"Implementing and enforcing effective preventive measures and protocols","Technologies":"Smart building technologies, IoT sensors for monitoring occupancy and air quality","People":"Real estate industry professionals, building occupants","Owner":"Real estate developers, property managers, government agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate understanding of the relationship between built environments and COVID-19 transmission","Impact":"Limited ability to implement effective control and mitigation measures","Mitigation":"Conducting thorough research and analysis, collaborating with health experts","Technologies":"Data analytics, machine learning for understanding patterns of transmission","People":"Facilities management professionals, health experts","Owner":"Research institutions, health organizations"},{"Description":"Reliance on outdated prevention and control methods","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission due to ineffectiveness of outdated methods","Mitigation":"Updating and adapting prevention and control methods based on current understanding of virus behavior","Technologies":"Advanced disinfection technologies, UV-C disinfection systems","People":"Maintenance staff, facilities management professionals","Owner":"Property management companies, facilities management teams"}]}
